name: amplifyaustin
description: Amplify Austin community involvement and map

scripts.setup: npm install && cd ./client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ../db && npm install
scripts.launch: cd ./client && npm run build && cd ../server && node bin/www && cd ../client npm run start &
scripts.lint:client: cd ./client && ./node_modules/.bin/eslint "src/**/*.{js,jsx}" && echo 'Your code has passed the linting guidelines' || echo 'Please fix the errors listed above'
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run setup && cd ./client && npm run build && cd ../server && node bin/www
scripts.deploy:build: npm run setup && cd ./client && npm run build

hooks.pre-commit: npm run prettier:client && npm run prettier:server
